name: Queen of Night and Magic
description: The Queen of Night and Magic is a Medium Fey with exceptional magical abilities, characterized by her regal bearing and an enchanting, otherworldly appearance.
memorable: Her ability to manipulate magic and control her surroundings makes her a dangerous and tactical adversary.
goals: To dominate the battlefield with powerful spells and control her enemies.
relations: May have connections with other fey creatures or serve dark gods of winter and magic.
environment: Typically found in shadowy places where magic prevails, often in fey realms or dark forests.
strengths: Resistant to magic and immune to cold damage and nonmagical attacks not made with cold iron.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to counterspells and lacks healing capabilities.
attacks: Can perform multiple attacks with her Rapier, dealing piercing and additional cold damage, or utilize powerful ranged spell attacks.
most_powerful_ability: Shadow Rift, inflicting substantial cold and necrotic damage while restraining enemies in its area.
senses: Possesses truesight up to 120 feet, allowing her to see through illusions and magical darkness.
skills: Exceptionally skilled in deception and intimidation, making her a dangerous social adversary.
additional_information: Can teleport as a bonus action for tactical advantage.
Capable of dispelling spells with her Sudden Fraying reaction.
Utilizes Legendary Resistance for enhanced survivability against magic.
Casts various spells at will to manipulate the battlefield.
Employs area control tactics with her Shadow Rift ability.
spellcasting: Can cast a variety of spells at will and several powerful ones three times per day or once per day.
test_queries: manipulative fey creature with shadow abilities
queen who dominates with spells and attacks
